	ldi $0, 0
	#0100-0000000000000000000000000000

	ldi $1, 3
	#0100-0000-0010-0000-0000-0000-0000-0011

	addi $2, $1, 9
	#0100-1000-0100-0001-0000-0000-0000-1001

	subi $2, $1, 9
	#0100-1100-0100-0001-0000-0000-0000-1001

	muli $2, $1, 4
	#0101-0000-0100-0001-0000-0000-0000-0100

	divi $2, $1, 2
	#0101-0100-0100-0001-0000-0000-0000-0010

	nandi $2, $1, 3
	#0101-1000-0100-0001-0000-0000-0000-0011

	xnori $2, $1, 6
	#0101-1100-0100-0001-0000-0000-0000-0110


#memaddr:8
ldi $1, abcd
#0100-0000-0010-0000-a-b-c-d

sw $1, $0, 0010h
#0110-0100-0010-0000-0-0-1-0

lw $2, $0, 0010h
#0110-0000-0100-0000-0-0-1-0

lb $3, $0, 0011h
#0110-1000-0110-0000-0-0-1-1

ldi $1, 0002
#0100-0000-0010-0000-0-0-0-2

sb $1, $0, 0011h
#0110-1100-0010-0000-0-0-1-1

lw $1, $0, 0010h
#0110-0000-0010-0000-0-0-1-0

add $3, $1, $2
#0000-0100-0110-0001-0001-0000-0000-0000



#memaddr:16
ldi $0, 0
#0100-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000

ldi $1, 1
#0100-0000-0010-0000-0000-0000-0000-0001

ldi $3, 3
#0100-0000-0110-0000-0000-0000-0000-0011

l3:#19   13h
add $0, $0, $1
#0000-0100-0000-0000-0000-1000-0000-0000

jmp l1 
#0111-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000-0001-0110

addi $0, $0, 10
#0100-1000-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000-1010

l1:#22    16h
ldi $2, l2
#0100-0000-0100-0000-0000-0000-0001-1001

jr $2
#0111-0100-0100-0010-0-0-0-0

addi $0, $0, 10
#0100-1000-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000-1010

l2:#25	19h
blt $0, $3, l3
#0111-1100-0000-0011-1111-1111-1111-1010


hlt
000000
